- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |snippet_download| |url_python|.
- |snippet_install| |python|.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |python|.
- Create a new Python environment based on this Python version.
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/license-info_python.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|.
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: Python <version number>``.
